attributes.action: Masters degree funding through the student loans company.
attributes.additional_details: I petition this government to look at the possibility of including masters study within the framework of student loans. At the present time if you want to further your education after Bachelors level you have to either take on a loan, find a sponsor or a bursary. Many of the brightest students are finding themselves un-employed with no hope of finding a job, this would at least allow people to become competitive.
